title: Nee Oru Pattam Song Lyrics Rojavai Killathe
stanzas: <div>Nee Oru Pattam Song Lyrics Rojavai Killathe

Nee Oru Pattam
naan oru pattam
naan oru pattam
nee oru pattam (2)
santharpathaal santhithom

engu povathu engu vazhvathu
engu vazhvathu engu povathu
iruvarum ondraai sinthithom

parakkum varaiyil para
palaya ninaippai mara
indha mudivai eduthukondu
irandha kaalathai mannithom
